title: Effective quark Lagrangian in the instanton-gas model
abstract: A straightforward derivation of the effective quark Lagrangian is presented for the topologically neutral chiral broken phase of the dilute instanton gas. The resulting quark Lagrangian is a nonlocal NJL-type and contains 4q, 6q,... vertices for any number of flavours. Correspondence of this result with previously known in literature is discussed in detail.
